mapper.select: SELECT m.id , m.name , m.birthDt , l.level , l.color , d.degree , m.phoneNo , m.winwinYn , m.sex , m.blackCnt , m.dormancyYn , m.leaveYn , m.banYn , m.joinDt , m.leaveDt , m.banDt , m.image , m.updateReason , m.dormancyReason , m.leaveReason , m.banReason FROM member m JOIN level l ON m.levelFk = l.id JOIN degree d ON m.degreeFk = d.id LEFT JOIN winwinSubscribe w ON m.id = w.memberFk LEFT JOIN admin a ON m.id = a.memberFk WHERE 1 = 1 AND m.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE admin SET grade = #{grade} WHERE 1 = 1 AND memberId = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT id , name , price , winPrice , address , winwinYn , closeYn , createDt , updateDt , description FROM climbingArea WHERE 1 = 1 AND id = #{id}
